PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: UPS battery monitoring, fan control, and power management for Argon ONE UP case
DEVICE_STATUS_DOC: Current status of Argon ONE UP hardware
DEVICE_DETECTED: Argon ONE UP detected and operational
DEVICE_NOT_DETECTED: Argon ONE UP not detected. Check I2C connection.
FAN_SETTINGS_DOC: Configure automatic fan speed based on CPU temperature
FAN_MODE_DOC: Select automatic temperature-based control or fixed manual speed
FAN_MANUAL_SPEED_DOC: Fixed fan speed when in manual mode. Range: 0-100%
FAN_TEMP_LOW_DOC: Temperature at which fan starts. Below this, fan is off.
FAN_SPEED_LOW_DOC: Fan speed when temperature reaches low threshold
FAN_SPEED_MED_DOC: Fan speed when temperature reaches medium threshold
FAN_SPEED_HIGH_DOC: Fan speed when temperature reaches high threshold
LID_SETTINGS_DOC: Configure what happens when the lid is closed
LID_ACTION_DOC: Action to perform when lid is closed
LID_SHUTDOWN_DELAY_DOC: Time to wait before shutdown when lid is closed. Range: 1-120 minutes.
POWER_DOUBLE_ACTION_DOC: Action when power button is pressed twice quickly
POWER_LONG_ACTION_DOC: Action when power button is held for 3+ seconds
BATTERY_SETTINGS_DOC: Configure battery level warnings and actions
BATTERY_WARN_LEVEL_DOC: Battery percentage at which to show warning notification
BATTERY_CRITICAL_LEVEL_DOC: Battery percentage at which to trigger critical action
BATTERY_CRITICAL_ACTION_DOC: Action when battery reaches critical level
KEYBOARD_SETTINGS_DOC: Volume key handling. Default: off (triggerhappy handles volume for Bluetooth, Flirc, etc.).
KEYBOARD_HANDLE_VOLUME_DOC: When off, volume keys are handled by triggerhappy (core). When on, plugin or custom script handles volume.
KEYBOARD_USE_CUSTOM_SCRIPT: Use custom script for volume keys
KEYBOARD_USE_CUSTOM_SCRIPT_DOC: When on, volume up/down/mute call your script with argument: up, down, or mute.
KEYBOARD_CUSTOM_SCRIPT_NAME_DOC: Script filename (e.g. volume-keys.sh). Called as: path/name up|down|mute.
EEPROM_SETTINGS_DOC: Raspberry Pi bootloader settings for UPS compatibility
PSU_MAX_CURRENT_DOC: Maximum current for UPS operation. Argon ONE UP requires 5000mA. Only for Raspberry Pi 5.
PSU_CURRENT_LOW: PSU current too low for UPS. Click Apply to fix.
EEPROM_NOT_SUPPORTED: EEPROM configuration not supported on this device
SHOW_ADVANCED_DOC: Enable to display debug and diagnostic settings
I2C_BUS_DOC: I2C bus number. Usually 1 for Raspberry Pi.
BATTERY_ADDRESS_DOC: I2C address of battery gauge IC. Default: 0x64
FAN_ADDRESS_DOC: I2C address of fan controller. Default: 0x1a
RESET_DEFAULTS_DOC: Reset all settings to factory defaults
REBOOT_MESSAGE: Settings changed. Reboot required to apply.
